inscription:
Inscription
verso, in graphite: [#6 Lawrence Polelanemo Hopi/ Hopi Terrace Garden]
in different hand: [purchased at Shungopovi/ 2nd Mesa City./Aug 1946/ in Hopi arts and crafts exhibit]
Inscription on backing paper: [Hopi Village (Hotvilla)/By/Lawrence Polelonema (Hopi) (Snake Clan)/ of Shungopovi 2nd Mesa/Signed on back./Purchased Aug.1946 at Hopi/Arts and crafts exhibit at that/village]
life_date: American (Hopituh Shinumu (Hopi), Arizona Snake Clan), born 1934
title: Hopi Terrace Garden
